<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hellbound Attorney](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1113)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The Hellbound attorney sought the assistance of a [phistophilus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=112)—one of [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18)'s contract devils—to bolster her legalistic ability on the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1).

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 21

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Devil_Hellbound.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Hellbound Attorney](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1113)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 64</row>

**Perception** +11; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
elegant cane (as [mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)), legal ledgers

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 60

**Resistances**
fire 4

**Weaknesses**
good 2

**Abrogation of Consequences** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The Hellbound attorney rolls a success or critical failure on a saving throw against a [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) effect; **Effect** The attorney finds a loophole in the wording of the effect, turning the success into a critical success or a critical failure into a normal failure.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
elegant cane +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 21
- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

**Opening Statement** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Trigger** The Hellbound attorney's turn begins; **Effect** The attorney enumerates the alleged crimes of a creature they can see and attempts a [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) check against that creature's Will DC. On a success, the attorney's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage (4d6 precision damage on a critical success) to the creature until the end of the attorney's turn.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-30" />
name: Hellbound Attorney
